author: nicoserranop
content:
Good news!  ðŸ¥³  Thanks to <@405860945018093609> we have a functioning web version of the frontend in IPFS: https://ceremony-ipfs.efprivacyscaling.org/ . It shows people the IPFS content hash but it is only accesible via a custom headers IPFS gateway. We would have a tutorial in the repo of how to set up the gateway (just edit the conf file using `ipfs config edit`).

The actual IPFS version is a bit outdated. We will need to rebuild it using the current state of the main branch

author: bridge-bot
content: <CarlBeek> > <CarlBeek>  fantastic! (re @kzg_ceremony_bot: <wackerow> <@550420431744794624> <https://github.com/zkparty/trusted-setup-frontend/pull/64> Just updated the FAQ PR using the tags that will enable it to work with translations. If you'd like to update this PR directly with any copy changes you're looking to make, just follow the format in the `pages/faq.tsx` file. Otherwise you can just send me the raw and I can update it.)
